j.logger.utils¶

Source

Some log related utilities.

trace¶

  • params: level,enabled
  • path:/core/logging/LogHandler.py (line:44)

Decorator factory. Use enabled to avoid the logging overhead when it’s not needed. Do not the tracing can not be enabled or disabled at runtime.

Typical usage:

TRACING_ENABLED = True

def myFunc(arg1, arg2=12): ...
